item.description:
We wanted our next event to cater more to dancing with some socializing, and we thought what better way to do this than at the upcoming Hyatt event?

Featuring Javier Arroyo and his "Salsa Night Band".

Plus music in the breaks by DJ D. Martinez and DJ Hernan, and special surprises!

This event is one in a series at the Hyatt. The Salsa Summer Bash was attended last June by over 500 people.

8pm: doors open, cash bar, hors doerves served

8:30pm: Lesson! "Salsa for Gringos" beginner lesson for people with two left feet and up. No partner needed.

9:30-1:30am: Dancing! Live music with Javier Arroy and his "Salsa Night Band", plus the best Salsa and Latin dance music with DJ D. Martinez and DJ Hernan

MEETUP GROUP DISCOUNT! We were able to secure a special deal for $15 for meetup group members! You can one of the organizers directly, or you can pay online through paypal (only $1 more for paypal fees). You must purchase tickets by Friday, September 29th for the special deal.

STUDENT DISCOUNT! Only $14 if purchased in advance....ID must be shown at the door.

There will be $8 Validated garage parking or free lots nearby.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: September Meetup Event @ Hyatt Regency Cambridge
